home.title: India Budget Explorer — Where Your Tax Money Goes
home.description: Interactive visualization of India's Union Budget 2025-26. See where Rs 50 lakh crore goes — revenue breakdown, ministry-wise spending, state allocations, and a personal tax calculator.

explore.title: Budget Data Explorer — Ministry-wise Spending | India Budget Explorer
